tag_list: online-marketing, social-media-management, internet-consultant, director-of-sales, seo, search-marketing
overview:
Internet Marketing Consultant and Executive Leader with demonstrated success in needs assessment, solution selling and executing in challenging environments. Proven ability to teach consulting skills and techniques to peers in a team environment. Skilled in negotiation, strategic planning, large territory management, team and relationship building, time management, risk management, target achievement, and networking.

My level of commitment and service has developed from my previous experience and ongoing commitment to learning and growth. The most rewarding of my experience is the repeat business and networking relationships that have been established throughout my career.

It is important for me to work with motivated individuals in an atmosphere with open communication and a team focus on success. I would truly appreciate the opportunity to expand my experience and work with you and your business to create more visibility to your preferred clients.

I love internet business and I am at my best in a start-up environment. When I can wear different hats and am given a lot of responsibility I thrive.
